con:part.con:content: <!--Published by JAX-WS RI at http://jax-ws.dev.java.net. RI's version is JAX-WS RI 2.2.1-b01-.--> <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://predic8.com/wsdl/crm/CRMService/1/" name="crm" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://predic8.com/wsdl/crm/CRMService/1/" xmlns:ns="http://predic8.com/material/1/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns1="http://predic8.com/material/1/" xmlns:ns2="http://predic8.com/common/1/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://predic8.com/wsdl/crm/CRMService/1/" xmlns:crm="http://predic8.com/crm/1/"> <xsd:import schemaLocation="http://www.predic8.com:8080/crm/CustomerService?xsd=2" namespace="http://predic8.com/crm/1/"/> <xsd:import schemaLocation="http://www.predic8.com:8080/crm/CustomerService?xsd=1" namespace="http://predic8.com/common/1/"/> <xsd:element name="createResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="create" type="tns:CreateType"/> <xsd:complexType name="CreateType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="customer" type="crm:CustomerType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="get" type="tns:GetType"/> <xsd:complexType name="GetType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="ns2:IdentifierType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="getResponse" type="tns:GetResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="GetResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="customer" type="crm:CustomerType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="getAll" type="tns:GetAllType"/> <xsd:complexType name="GetAllType"> <xsd:sequence></xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="getAllResponse" type="tns:GetAllResponseType"/> <xsd:complexType name="GetAllResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="customer" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="crm:CustomerType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="createRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:create"/> </message> <message name="createResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:createResponse"/> </message> <message name="getRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:get"/> </message> <message name="getResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:getResponse"/> </message> <message name="getAllRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:getAll"/> </message> <message name="getAllResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:getAllResponse"/> </message> <portType name="CRMServicePT"> <operation name="create"> <input name="input1" message="tns:createRequest"/> <output name="output1" message="tns:createResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="get"> <input name="input2" message="tns:getRequest"/> <output name="output2" message="tns:getResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="getAll"> <input name="input3" message="tns:getAllRequest"/> <output name="output3" message="tns:getAllResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <wsdl:binding name="CRMServicePTBinding" type="tns:CRMServicePT"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="create"> <soap:operation soapAction="create_action"/> <wsdl:input name="input1"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="output1"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="get"> <soap:operation soapAction="get_action"/> <wsdl:input name="input2"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="output2"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getAll"> <soap:operation soapAction="getAll_action"/> <wsdl:input name="input3"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="output3"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="CustomerService"> <wsdl:port name="CRMServicePTPort" binding="tns:CRMServicePTBinding"> <soap:address location="http://www.predic8.com:8080/crm/CustomerService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<!--Published by JAX-WS RI at http://jax-ws.dev.java.net. RI's version is JAX-WS RI 2.2.1-b01-.--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://predic8.com/crm/1/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://predic8.com/crm/1/" xmlns:co="http://predic8.com/common/1/"> <xsd:import schemaLocation="http://www.predic8.com:8080/crm/CustomerService?xsd=1" namespace="http://predic8.com/common/1/"/> <xsd:complexType name="CompanyAddressType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="co:AddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="companyName" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CustomerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="person" type="co:PersonType"/> <xsd:element name="address" type="tns:CompanyAddressType"/> <xsd:element name="id" type="co:IdentifierType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<!--Published by JAX-WS RI at http://jax-ws.dev.java.net. RI's version is JAX-WS RI 2.2.1-b01-.--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://predic8.com/common/1/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://predic8.com/common/1/"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Common datatypes that are used in different systems.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:include schemaLocation="http://www.predic8.com:8080/crm/CustomerService?xsd=3"/> <xsd:simpleType name="IdentifierType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier for business objects.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:pattern value="[A-Z]{2}-\d{5}"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="PersonType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="tns:IdentifierType"/> <xsd:element name="firstName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="lastName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="address" type="tns:AddressType"/> <xsd:element name="age" type="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="street" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="city" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="zipCode" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<!--Published by JAX-WS RI at http://jax-ws.dev.java.net. RI's version is JAX-WS RI 2.2.1-b01-.--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://predic8.com/common/1/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://predic8.com/common/1/"> <xsd:complexType name="MoneyType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="amount" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xsd:element name="currency" type="tns:CurrencyType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CurrencyType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="EUR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="USD"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

con:testStep.name: ManualTestStep
con:testStep.con:description: Make sure link is clicked which is sent through email
